title: API Academy: Making an API Request
description: Your next challenge is to obtain the Lovelace Spell Key. To do so, you must make a successful API request.

validation_fields.name: answer1
validation_fields.label: True or false: Some APIs require authentication when making a request. Twilio Programmable SMS is one of these APIs. To make a request to Twilio Programmable SMS you must provide your Account SID and an Auth Token in the request. These values can be found on your main dashboard in your Twilio Console.

validation_fields.name: answer2

validation_fields.name: answer3
validation_fields.placeholder: `What's the sid` of your new message?
validation_fields.label: From your command line, use cURL to create a message with the Twilio Programmable SMS API. Be sure to the look at the [documentation](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sms/api/message-resource?code-sample=code-create-a-message&code-language=curl&code-sdk-version=json) if you're not sure how. Don't forget to include all the required parameters. When you're done, you'll receive a response from the API. If something went wrong, you'll receive an error. Otherwise you'll receive a JSON body with information about the message you created. Find the `sid` of the message and submit it here as your answer.
